caption: b'Today, ConocoPhillips and license partners Total, V\xc3\xa5r Energi, Equinor and Petoro announced first oil from the revitalized Tor field in the North Sea. \xe2\x80\x9c\xe2\x80\x98Having produced for 37 years in the Tor field, we proudly continue expected production lifetime beyond 60 years,\xe2\x80\x9d said Steinar V\xc3\xa5ge, ConocoPhillips\xe2\x80\x99 president, Europe, Middle East and North Africa. Resources of about 60-70 million barrels oil equivalent are expected to be recovered from the subsea development located in the Greater Ekofisk area. Shown: Rendering of two new wells which join six already producing wells. #firstoil #ConocoPhillips #Tor #Ekofisk  #Norway #oilandgas'

b'Repost from @nfwf
\xe2\x80\xa2
Today is all about the birds! NFWF and @conocophillips just announced $1.3 million in grant funding to conserve breeding, stopover and wintering bird habitat in the United States. The nine projects receiving grants will protect and restore grasslands, wetlands and coastal habitats, track and monitor bird populations using innovative techniques, and facilitate conservation practices on working ranchlands.

The grants were awarded through the ConocoPhillips SPIRIT of Conservation Program, a partnership between NFWF, ConocoPhillips and @usfws. With a goal of conserving and recovering populations of imperiled birds, the partnership supports work to improve the quality and connectivity of important bird habitats and accelerate innovations for understanding bird conservation needs across their ranges. 

Since 2005, ConocoPhillips, NFWF and the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service have invested more than $13.9 million in projects through the SPIRIT of Conservation program. Grantees have provided an additional $30.5 million in matching contributions for a total conservation impact of $44.4 million. As results of these investments, more than 503,000 acres of important fish and wildlife habitat in 13 states have been conserved or restored.

Congratulations @theconservationfund, @gulf.coast.bird.observatory, @borderlandsresearchinstitute, @manometcenter, @pheasants_forever, @wsgalt, @ducksunlimitedinc  and Winnett ACES!
.
.
.
#birds #birdsofig #migration #conservation #wildlife #habitat #habitatconservation #environment #nature #grassland #wetland #coastal #science #ranch #habitat #wildlifephotography #wildlifewednesday'

b'Research with ocean drones (gliders) provides valuable knowledge about ocean life. The ocean drones are autonomous and driven by wind, waves, gravity and solar energy. By using gliders to collect new data, we will increase our knowledge about the marine environment where we operate. Our goal is to carry out our activities with minimized environmental impact. ConocoPhillips will continue the glider project for three more years. #conocophillips #norway #subsea #gliders #dronestagram #offshore'

b'Shrinking pad size and increased drilling radius help minimize the infrastructure footprint for our unconventional operations in the Lower 48. b'ConocoPhillips announced a new gas condensate discovery in production license 1009 located 22 miles northwest of the Heidrun Field and 150 miles from the coast of Norway in the Norwegian Sea. ConocoPhillips Skandinavia AS is operator of the license with 65 percent working interest. PGNiG Upstream Norway AS holds 35 percent working interest. The discovery well, 6507/4-1 (Warka), was drilled in 1,312 feet of water to a total depth of 16,355 feet. Preliminary estimates place the size of the discovery between 50 and 190 million barrels of recoverable oil equivalent. Further appraisal will be conducted to determine potential flow rates, the reservoir\xe2\x80\x99s ultimate resource recovery and plans for development. #ConocoPhillips #Norway #discovery #oilandgas #gascondensate #energyindustry #offshore #leiveiriksson #offshorerig'

b'Before sunrise during recent drilling operations in the Permian Delaware Basin, Drilling Supervisor Loyd Shirley and Contractor Greg Rivera monitor the Roulette 3H well pad. Roulette is a six-well pad in the China Draw prospect area 12 miles north of Orla, Texas. The Permian Basin in West Texas and Southeastern New Mexico is a prime example of leveraging one of the company\xe2\x80\x99s large legacy positions, using new technology and new ideas to test liquids-rich conventional and unconventional plays. Photo by Patrick Currey. Click the link in our profile to see more. #ConocoPhillips #permianbasin #delawarebasin #oilandgas #oilandgaslife #energyindustry #permian'

b"This year, more than 2,300 employees, contractors and retirees committed to ConocoPhillips' six-week global wellness challenge. Sani Dadan, a senior field rotating equipment engineer in Indonesia, joined several colleagues to form OnCom Bandung, a weekend cycling group. Sani cycled about 870 miles (1,400 km) and climbed more than 44,000 feet (13,400 meters) in elevation during the challenge. b'In the Bakken, desanding has been wholly cyclonic since 2017. Cyclonic desanders create centrifugal force, spinning solids and fluids into separate streams. Solids spiral down to the underflow outlet, while fluids are forced in the opposite direction to the overflow. Solids are removed from the accumulator while the unit remains online. Cyclonic wellhead desanders treat full wellstream flow, including gas, oil and water. Says First Delivery Supervisor Rory Ketterling, "The efficiency is in the 95-98% range.\xe2\x80\x9d Click the link in our profile to learn more.'

b"Biodiversity loss requires local mitigation. To accelerate reclamation and restore disturbances in the Canadian boreal forest, we have led an industry collaboration through Canada's Oil Sands Innovation Alliance (COSIA) to develop, share and implement best practices for reclaiming exploration well sites. The Faster Forests program started in 2009 and has resulted in more than 5 million trees and shrubs being planted on about 5,500 acres of land in the oil sands region. Visit conocophillips.com/sustainability to learn more about our mitigation hierarchy. #ConocoPhillips #Canada #OilSands #fasterforests"

b"Steinar V\xc3\xa5ge, ConocoPhillips President for Europe, Middle East and North Africa, spoke on ConocoPhillips Norway's HSE culture during this year\xe2\x80\x99s Petroleum Safety Authority\xe2\x80\x99s Top Executive Conference in Stavanger. In Norway, close collaboration between employees and contractors and a focus on HSE has contributed to making the Greater Ekofisk Area one of the safest workplaces on the Norwegian shelf. #ConocoPhillips #Norway #ConocoPhillipsNorge #Ekofisk #oilandgas #energyindustry"

Read more about the transaction here: https://bit.ly/2T4cOaA #ConocoPhillips #ConchoResources #oilandgas #energyindustry'

b"After graduating from Harvard College and Stanford University Law School, Kevin Avery (right, with late U.S. Congressman John Lewis) set his sights on Washington, D.C. Today Kevin leads ConocoPhillips\xe2\x80\x99 federal government affairs advocacy efforts while fostering a culture of equality and opportunity for all. b'The Breidablikk field in the North Sea is now ready to be developed, and the plan for development and operation has been submitted to Norway\xe2\x80\x99s Minster of Petroleum and Energy. The Breidablikk field is one of the largest oil fields on the Norwegian continental shelf that has not yet been developed. Knowledge of the Breidablikk reservoir has matured over time, through the use of new seismic. This has contributed to an increase in the expected recovery from the field, which in addition to the volumes in the main reservoir also consists of oil in thinner sand zones called injectites.  #ConocoPhillips #Norway #exploration #production #northsea'

Thanks to our partners, @mypubliclands, @usfws\xe2\x80\x99s Partners for Fish and Wildlife Program, @u.s.forestservice, @microsoft, @conocophillips and @bnsfrailway.

b'ConocoPhillips uses four climate-related risk scenarios in our strategic planning process. Each scenario models the full energy system including oil, natural gas, solar, wind, nuclear and storage, as well their related GHG emissions and pricing policies. Each of these plausible pathways is designed to stretch our thinking about potential rates of new technology adoption, policy development and consumer behavior. Want to learn more? Check out ConocoPhillips.com/sustainability to see our strategy for managing climate-related risks. #ConocoPhillips #Montney'

b'After suspension in April due to the COVID-19 pandemic, construction of a new Propane Storage Unit at ConocoPhillips\xe2\x80\x99 Teesside plant in the U.K. restarted in June. Crude oil and NGLs from the Greater Ekofisk and Valhall areas in Norway are delivered to Teesside. Click the link in our profile to see more stories from our global operations. #conocophillips #teesside #crudeoil #propane'

b'Managing the potential for large volumes of rainfall was one of the early planning challenges at our Australia Pacific LNG (APLNG) facility near Gladstone. The industry-leading stormwater management system we installed has proven effective at protecting critical environments, with stormwater runoff from the site being cleaner than runoff from nearby undisturbed areas. Visit www.conocophillips.com/sustainability/sustainability-news to see how it works. #ConocoPhillips #Australia #APLNG #LNG #Gladstone #watermanagement'

b"ConocoPhillips Alaska's West Sak team (photo taken pre-COVID-19) championed a vision for a hybrid, electric submersible pump system (ESP). \xe2\x80\x9cThe rigless ESP wells on the North Slope allow us to clean out sand in multi-lateral wells far below the set depth of the motor without performing a costly rig workover,\xe2\x80\x9d said Senior Production Engineer Marina Krysinski. \xe2\x80\x9cIt\xe2\x80\x99s truly a game changer.\xe2\x80\x9d Click the link in our profile to learn more about the innovative system and the teamwork that made it possible. #ConocoPhillips #Innovation #Production #Teamwork #Oilandgas #EnergyIndustry #rig #northslope"

b'Last night we lit our headquarters in celebration of Juneteenth \xe2\x80\x93 with thousands of lights representing the thousands of ConocoPhillips employees standing for racial justice. Today, the work continues. #ConocoPhillips #Juneteenth Photo by @hallpuckett'

b'#DYK: Juneteenth is the oldest national commemoration of the ending of slavery in the U.S., marking the day in 1865 that enslaved people in Texas first learned that they were free. #ConocoPhillips\xe2\x80\x99 virtual celebration, hosted by our Bartlesville and Houston Black Employee Networks (BEN), included a live-streamed music set by Robert Banks & Positive Productions, a presentation by BEN and a few words from CEO Ryan Lance. While we couldn\xe2\x80\x99t be together in person, we were more than 300 strong! Happy Juneteenth! #ConocoPhillips #Juneteenth #PositiveEnergy #EnergyIndustry #oilandgaslife'

b"We are excited to bring math programming to Houston kids through our work together!

Repost from @houstonpubmedia
\xe2\x80\xa2
We are so thankful to have @unitedwayhouston and @conocophillips continued support towards children's educational programming. Cheers to our third year of Math in a Flash series on TV 8 PBS Kids! With reliable community partners, we're able to fuel our mission and make a significant change in our community that REALLY matters. Together we can continue to inspire a future generation to love learning.

Learn more at www.houstonpublicmedia.org/mathinaflash 
Together we do it, for the Love of Houston!"

b'Repost from @habitathouston\n\xe2\x80\xa2\nIt\xe2\x80\x99s #TBT, and this week we\xe2\x80\x99re celebrating @conocophillips! #HoustonHabitat thanks them for their continuous support in helping us provide homes for our community :house_with_garden::hammer:'

b'The ConocoPhillips SPIRIT of Conservation program is seeking grant proposals to conserve breeding, stopover and wintering habitats for migratory birds, and to provide technical assistance to improve bird habitat conservation practices on working lands. To apply, visit: https://www.nfwf.org/apply-grant\n\nSince 2005, the program has awarded 105 grants worth more than $12.6 million to conservation groups in 13 states and five countries. Grantees matched this funding with an additional $27.5 million, for a total conservation investment of $40.1 million. As a result of these investments, more than 315,000 acres of critical fish and wildlife habitat have been conserved, restored or enhanced.\xe2\x80\x8b Pre-proposals are due June 18th for approximately $1.3 million in grant funding. The program is a partnership between ConocoPhillips, @nfwf, @usfws and the #NationalResourcesConservationService. #ConocoPhillips #Conservation #migratorybirds #birds #habitatconservation #positiveenergy'

b'Have you ever seen a "tigrillo" cub? This neotropical feline, also called an ocelot, was found abandoned near Cuatro Bocas, Colombia. We celebrate not only the life of the cub, but also our strong relationship with the community. #ConocoPhillips #Colombia #PositiveEnergy #tigrillo #ocelot #animalrescue #corpocesar #wildlifewednesday'

b"ConocoPhillips supports teachers - and students - year-round through math education partnerships with Rice University, the United Way, the Houston Astros and the Houston Texans. With Rice, our REMSL programs for Houston-area teachers focus on math, science and building authentic #STEM environments in the classroom. Our Math Teacher of the Month program with the Houston Astros recognizes Houston-area math teachers who go above and beyond. TORO's Math Drills provides free math resources for third and fourth grade teachers to use in their classrooms. All our programs align with a single goal: to increase the number of Houston students who pass Algebra 1, graduate from high school and are ready to succeed in college. Applications for our free @RICEU_Stem programs, which include 100+ CPE hours and $1,000+ in stipends and materials, are accepted through May 8 at https://rstem.rice.edu/teachers. Learn more about all our programs for teachers and students at ConocoPhillips.com/matheducation. \n#ConocoPhillips #teacherappreciation #teacherappreciationweek #mathteacher #scienceteacher #positiveenergy #STEM #riceuniversity #ricestem #Astros #torosmathdrills"

b"After seeing the need for additional PPE in the Houston medical community, ConocoPhillips Chinese American employees organized. Within two days, employees and their friends, families and neighbors raised enough money to order 4,500 masks and 200 protective gowns. Through collaboration with the Houston Chinese Alliance, they secured and delivered the PPE to Nexus Hospital, St. Luke's Hospital, West Houston Medical Center, Texas Children's Hospital, Houston Fire Station #78 and Precinct 5 Constable office. Click the link in our profile to read more about how our business units and functions are contributing to the fight against the coronavirus. #ConocoPhillips #PPE #HoustonStrong #positiveenergy"

b"Congratulations to Dr. Gladys Kalema-Zikusoka, Founder and CEO of @CTPH_Uganda on winning this year's St Andrews Prize for the Environment. Conservation Through Public Health was founded on the belief that conserving wildlife must go hand-in-hand with supporting neighboring communities. The prize will enable CTPH to replicate a community-based health and conservation model to help protect the critically endangered Eastern Lowland Gorillas in the Democratic Republic of Congo. For more than 20 years, ConocoPhillips has supported The St Andrews Prize for the Environment. Visit conocophillips.com/sustainabilitynews to learn more. #ConocoPhillips #CTPH #StAndrewsPrize #UniversityofStAndrews #womeninscience #womeninconservation  #InternationalWomensDay"

b'ConocoPhillips Malaysia applied a machine learning algorithm to fault prediction on compressive seismic imaging, accelerating interpretation time by weeks. b'ConocoPhillips worked closely with Solstad Offshore to install batteries on three platform supply vessels (PSVs) that run supplies to our Greater Ekofisk installations in the North Sea. As a result, consumption of marine gas oil is reduced by 15%, and annual emissions of carbon dioxide (CO2) and nitrous oxide (NOx) are reduced annually by around 3,700 tonnes and 60 tonnes respectively. When the PSVs dock in Tananger they immediately connect to hydroelectric power, which provides a better onboard working environment by eliminating noise and vibrations, as well as air emissions. This further reduces emissions by 1,400 tonnes of CO2 and 20 tonnes of NOx annually.  #ConocoPhillips #Norway #SolstadOffshore #Ekofisk #NorthSea #Offshore #Production'

b'ConocoPhillips Alaska broke the state record for longest rotary well \xe2\x80\x94 32,468 feet. Doyon Rig 25 drilled to a measured depth of 14,370 feet before turning horizontally into the reservoir and drilling another 18,098 feet, completing six miles of drilling. Click the link in our profile to see how the team did it. Congratulations to the team!  #ConocoPhillips #Alaska #oilandgas #energyindustry #milestone #production #geosteering #teamwork'

b'Nearly two-thirds of Australia\xe2\x80\x99s Curtis Island is protected for environmental conservation as a result of an initiative by the three Curtis Island liquified natural gas (LNG) operators, including ConocoPhillips Australia as downstream operator of Australia Pacific LNG. The LNG companies worked to consolidate a number of properties on the island in order to protect a range of critical environments within the Great Barrier Reef World Heritage Area. The 2019 transfer of 3,200 hectares (about 7,900 acres) of land to government ownership to form the Curtis Island Conservation Park is the final step in achieving the goal of safeguarding the island\xe2\x80\x99s unique ecology and heritage for future generations. Click the link in our profile to learn more. #ConocoPhillips #Australia #curtisisland'

b"To help reduce waste \xe2\x80\x94 or eliminate it altogether \xe2\x80\x94 ConocoPhillips Canada's Surmont team formed the multi-disciplinary Operations Waste and Liability Strategy Team, more affectionately known as the OWLS. The OWLS team is leading the company in managing waste more efficiently and effectively, achieving some industry firsts along the way. Check out ConocoPhillips.ca to see how we're using technology to turn organic waste into biomass. #ConocoPhillips #Canada #Surmont #reducereuserecycle #biomass #wastemanagement #positiveenergy"

b"#DYK: January is Human Trafficking Awareness Month, and #ConocoPhillips continues our work with Truckers Against Trafficking to help arm law enforcement officials with the knowledge and tools to combat trafficking in their communities. We also host training events to bring together oil and natural gas companies and their suppliers with law enforcement agencies, general managers of truck stops, representatives of trucking companies and state trucking associations. Last year alone, we funded: 1) Training for 50 investigators from approximately 20 states at the Federal Motor Carrier Safety Administration's (FMCSA) National Training Center in Oklahoma; 2) Two first-time trainings on the topic for New Hampshire State Police; 3) 70 officers in two joint trainings for California Highway Patrol and Nevada Highway Patrol and 4) Four first-time trainings and a \xe2\x80\x9cTrain the Trainer\xe2\x80\x9d session for Georgia State Patrol and the Georgia Department of Transportation HERO unit attended by 325 officers. Visit @TruckersAgainstTrafficking to learn more about what you can do. #ConocoPhillips #TruckersAgainstTrafficking #HumanTrafficking #HumanTraffickingAwarenessMonth"

b'In our first Big Picture of 2020, traditional wooden dhows are moored against the ultramodern skyline of Doha. Before the discovery of oil and gas transformed the nation into a modern economic powerhouse, Qatar had a long maritime tradition. Dhows were used for fishing, trading and pearl diving, then one of Qatar\xe2\x80\x99s main industries. Since 2003, @ConocoPhillipsQatar has partnered with Qatar Petroleum to develop Qatargas 3, a large-scale LNG project in Ras Laffan Industrial City. In 2010 the company launched the Global Water Sustainability Center, a team of experts dedicated to developing innovative solutions for treating and recycling byproduct water from oil and gas operations. Visit conocophillips.qa to learn more about our work in Qatar. (Photography by Martin Vargas.) #ConocoPhillips #COPQatar #Qatar #Doha #LNG #GWSC'
